devdoc.details: A smart contract for posting jobs, escrowing payments, assigning freelancers, handling work submission, payment release, refunds, and dispute resolution. Stores job descriptions off-chain using an IPFS CID.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params._jobId: The ID of the job to apply for.
The ID of the job to escrow funds for.
The ID of the job being marked as done.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

postJob(string,string,uint256).details: Creates a job entry storing description CID off-chain.

params._budget: The payment amount for the job in wei.
params._descriptionCID: The IPFS CID for the job description. <<< CORRECTED PARAM NAME

params._jobId: The ID of the job to dispute.
The ID of the job for which to request a refund.
The ID of the job for which to release payment.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._awardToFreelancer: Boolean indicating if funds go to freelancer (true) or employer (false).
params._jobId: The ID of the disputed job.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: JobBoard

applyForJob(uint256).notice: Allows anyone (except employer) to apply for (be assigned to) an open, escrowed job.

escrowFunds(uint256).notice: Allows the employer to escrow the payment for an open job.

markWorkDone(uint256).notice: Allows the assigned freelancer to mark the work as completed (ready for approval).

postJob(string,string,uint256).notice: Allows anyone to post a new job.

raiseDispute(uint256).notice: Allows employer or freelancer to raise a dispute on ASSIGNED or AWAITING_APPROVAL jobs.

refundEmployer(uint256).notice: Allows the employer to reclaim escrowed funds if the job is still OPEN after REFUND_DELAY.

releasePayment(uint256).notice: Allows the employer to release the escrowed payment to the freelancer after work submission.

resolveDispute(uint256,bool).notice: Allows the contract owner (admin) to resolve a dispute.
